name: random_joke
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool humor_jokes_and_memes.
Tool description: Humor API lets you search through 50,000 jokes, over 200,000 memes, and gifs. From Chuck Norris, over Knock Knock to Yo Mama jokes, you'll find something for every occasion.
API description: Get a random joke.
See https://humorapi.com/docs/#Random-Joke for more.

keywords.description: A comma-separated list of keywords to filter the jokes (default is 'rocket').

include_tags.description: A comma-separated list of tags that the joke must have (default is 'one_liner').

min_rating.description: The minimum rating of the joke between 0 and 10 (default is 7).

max_length.description: The maximum length of the joke in characters (default is 200).

exclude_tags.description: A comma-separated list of tags that the joke must not have (default is 'nsfw').
